What is pcos? I've seen and heard people mention that but I don't know what it is.

I also have Pcos I had a miscarriage on april 3rd 2011 and have yet to have my first af  still waiting . as far as will you get pregnant again Sure I dont see why you wouldent . I have six living children and had seven pregnancy's all with pcos I do take metformin though 1500 mg a day and i think that helps with my cycles . Good luck to you ssbd =)
o and I lost 10 lbs in dec and i concieved in jan  so i think weightloss helps a ton :)
